EmailTemplate.NEW_USER_REGISTRATION:
'[Name]', Thank You for registering with us.

We are very excited and look forward to training with you!
EmailTemplate.NEW_USER_REGISTRATION_ADMIN:
A new customer was set up in SaifLogic!

Customer: '[Entity]'
Name: '[Name]'
Member E-Mail: '[Email]'
Member Phone: '[Phone]'
EmailTemplate.NEW_INSPECTOR_REGISTRATION_ADMIN:
A new inspector has registered with Upstream Inspections!

Dealership: '[Dealership]'
Name: '[Name]'
Title: '[Title]'
E-Mail: '[Email]'
Phone: '[Phone]'

Please review their information and enable them so they can get started as an Inspector!
EmailTemplate.NEW_INSPECTION_ORDER: Thank you for your inspection order. Your order has been received. One of our inspectors will be reaching out to very soon to schedule an inspection. We look forward to providing you the with best inspection service as possible!
EmailTemplate.NEW_INSPECTION_ORDER_ADMIN:
An inspection order was submitted by [DEALER_NAME] with [DEALERSHIP].

Expected number of cars: [QUANTITY]
Target date: [DATE]
Special Instructions: [SPECIAL_NOTES]
EmailTemplate.NEW_INSPECTION_ORDER_ADMIN_RETAIL:
A Retail Inspection order was submitted. Please see details below and get in touch with the customer:


Name: '[Name]'
E-Mail: '[Email]'
Phone: '[Phone]'
EmailTemplate.CUSTOMER_QUESTION:
Hello, a customer has a question. Please see below:

Message from:
Customer Name: '[Name]'
Email: '[Email]'>
Phone Number: '[Phone]'>
Message:
'[Message]'
EmailTemplate.INSPECTION_COMPLETE_ADMIN:
Order ID: '[OrderNumber]' was marked complete!
Please proceed to closing this transaction.
EmailTemplate.NEW_INSPECTION_ORDER_BULK: Thank you for your inspection order. Your order has been received. One of our inspectors will be reaching out to very soon to schedule an inspection. We look forward to providing you the with best inspection service as possible!
EmailTemplate.NEW_INSPECTION_ORDER_ADMIN_BULK:
Hello,
A bulk inspection order was requested. Please review and assign to the appropriate inspectors!
EmailTemplate.PASSWORD_CHANGE:
Hello,
A password change was made for your Sugar Land MMA portal login ID. If this was not initiated by you, please contact us at -- immediately.
If you did initiate the password change, you can ignore this notice!

Sugar Land MMA Administration
